Articles.Content: ^^^ Say hello to References. I'm TheReporter, and as the name says it, I report stuff that might go wrong in KSP. Slow loading? I'm your guy. Building ships? 50/50. Smarts with getting around in Kerbin? Yep. But anyway, I'll be here when you need me!

Well then. Hello, References! And hello, Mr. Reporter sir.

How long have you been playing KSP?

Welcome to the forums!

As a reporter, you're in luck; we have an entire subsection of the forum dedicated to Mission Reports if you want to share the latest updates on the progress of your space program. You may also find our Support forums handy for bug reports.

Wait... Who?

Why are you here?

What are you doing?

When is your next thing?

Where are you?

How did you learn about the forums?

Welcome?
Hello and welcome to the forums TheReporter, hope you have some fun here!
Hello mate, I think there's plenty to report around here!
But don't abuse the 'report post' button
